'''Magic: The Gathering Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|magic-gathering-comes-minecraft|Magic: The Gathering comes to Minecraft|May 4, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 15 skins themed around the tabletop and collectible card game ''{{wikipedia|Magic: The Gathering}}''. It can be bought in the marketplace or redeemed using a code found on certain promotional cards.
